footerText.value: We gladly service Aurora, Arvada, Castle Pines, Castle Rock, Centennial, Cherry Hills Village, Denver, Englewood, Evergreen, Foxfield, Franktown, Genesee, Golden, Greenwood Village, Heritage Hills, Highlands, Highlands Ranch, Lakewood, Littleton, Lone Tree, Morrison, Parker, Sedalia, Stapleton, The Pinery, and Wheat Ridge.
